alert.note: Alert for McIntosh; Pittsburg (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 23 at 4:56PM CDT until September 23 at 5:15PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN MCINTOSH AND NORTH CENTRAL PITTSBURG COUNTIES... At 453 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Indianola, moving southeast at 15 mph. THIS IS A DESTRUCTIVE STORM FOR Indianola...Crowder...and Canadian! HAZARD...Softball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. At 445 pm, softball size hail was reported in Raiford. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be severely injured. Expect shattered windows, extensive damage to roofs, siding, and vehicles. Locations in or near the path include... Eufaula... Crowder... Canadian... Indianola... Arrowhead State Park... Raiford... Vivian... THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...DESTRUCTIVE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...4.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: This storm is producing large hail. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
